Class AbstractBowlController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AbstractController
      • controllers.AbstractBowlController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBowlController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BowlController

    public abstract class AbstractBowlController
extends AbstractController
implements IBowlController
    Common abstract AbstractBowlController for Bowl controllers.
    Author:
    mbsusr01 ninja-superbowl 19.04.2017 mbsusr01

      • putBowlDtoIntoSession

        public void putBowlDtoIntoSession(BowlDto bowlDto,
                                  ninja.session.Session session)
        Description copied from interface: IBowlController
        Put data from a user interface form into the session instance.

        Checks every value from session instance for null value. If a value is null it will be replaced by a whitespace character.

        Specified by:
        putBowlDtoIntoSession in interface IBowlController
        Parameters:
        bowlDto - the BowlDto (Data Transfer Object) instance
        session - the Ninja Session instance
